circumstances: Both engines failed simultaneously in flight. The pilot reduced his altitude and attempted an emergency landing when the aircraft crashed in flames on a golf course located near Macon. The aircraft was totally destroyed and all four occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Both engines failed in normal cruise following the combination of the following factors:
- Improper operation of powerplant and powerplant controls, 
- Oil starvation, 
- Improper emergency procedures, 
- Complete failure both engines, 
- Fire after impact,
- Oil shut off valve to right engine found partly closed, left engine was closed.
